io.pravega.common

Class AbstractTimer

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.pravega.common.AbstractTimer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Timer

    public abstract class AbstractTimer
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides a customizable way of measuring elapsed time.
